data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 10,509 believers in Rivière du Rempart, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rivière du Rempart, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, there are 24,582 people in the state of Rivière du Rempart who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 108,100 citizens of Rivière du Rempart, Mauritius, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Rivière du Rempart, Mauritius to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Rivière du Rempart, Mauritius.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Rivière du Rempart that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Rivière du Rempart, Mauritius.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
